simplifiedChinese.title: Travel Plans and Greetings
simplifiedChinese.Question1: What is Paul's stated ambition? How is it like your ambitions? How is it different?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: Consider all the individuals Paul greets. What does this tell about how much he valued people and relationships?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: What inspired Paul to make travel plans?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: When you consider the future how much do kingdom goals shape your plans? Are there changes this passage would inspire you to make?
